website_summaries.verdict: A kit that is kid friendly with a nice selection of colors that washes off easily, but still holds color well.
pros: Set contains enough paint to paint a lot of faces
Includes a lot of stencils to help improve your painting efforts
cons: The glitter that comes with this set does not paint on like glitter in some other sets

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Item sent was not as pictured. Frustrating as I chose this pallet based on the picture so I would have removable pans. Extremely low quality packaging and even the tray is extremely low quality. Paint them self also seem to be pretty low quality they don’t blend well and takes a lot to build up proper layers to get something that looks decent. I have worked with many different types of face paint as a professional make up artist and I will tell you don’t waste your money get yourself some snac I have worked with many different types of face paint as a professional make up artist and these paints are not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: IMH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality. Bright colors!
customer_reviews.text: Used this paint on my husband and I. We were Gamora and Yandu for Halloween. It stayed on great and we had a lot of comments on how great our paint looked. We were at the Disney Halloween party and a lot of cast members said we had the best Yandu and Gamora makeup they had ever seen! We had to scrub pretty good to get it off, but that was worth it staying on so great during the party.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Pett

customer_reviews.title: They are Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have been painting faces for many many years and Finally decided to get myself some professional quality paints! I recieved them so fast, I've been painting up a storm with them! They are Super easy to use, you dont have to do multiple layers with the paints in order to get a good solid color(unlike many other kinds) the brushes they come with are perfect for the details and designs! They are Just All Around Amazing!!! I am going to be getting another set of even more colors! The 16 color palette set, can't wait!! I will leave a review for those with pictures as soon as I've recieved them!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Case arrived cracked as well as one of the pot ...
customer_reviews.text: Case arrived cracked as well as one of the pot cases. One of the brushes was uneven and when I tried to straighten the bristles they all pulled out. The paint itself is not very vibrant. I’d try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: gocarygo

customer_reviews.title: Non toxic !!
customer_reviews.text: We love the fact that this is a non toxic product! No parabens ! This is a great product.. the colors are vibrant and applies wonderfully, dries quickly and very easy to remove. We bought for Halloween to use on face, so the non toxic is key! Very happy customers !
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Colors received do not match picture
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this. There was no black, light blue, or brown (3 colors I needed). As you can see from my picture, 3 of the colors were repeated exactly and these were almost fluorescent, not at all like the description picture. I tried to use the white, but was unable to get it opaque on my child's face despite multiple repeat applications. I am trying a different brand but sadly it won't get here before the halloween party later today.
customer_reviews.author: Twins Fan

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Face Paints! And Blue Squid Customer Service Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: What a great experience! A first time face painter, I found the paints so easy to use. This sweet little girl has sensitive skin and there were no reactions whatsoever. The paint stayed on her face all day through lots of outdoor play, meals, until bathtime where they EASILY washed away with gentle no tears soap and water. The customer support is fabulous with videos to give you tips to make the face you choose and even what to do if you change your mind (or in my case, the child moves and you suddenly have lines where you didn’t expect!) we are going to have so much fun with this!
customer_reviews.author: LeahH

customer_reviews.title: Happy Face Painting!
customer_reviews.text: I am an amateur face painter and have used acrylics, but I only paint for Mardi Gras and many times they have dried out when I open them. I like that your paints can be refreshed with water when I choose to use them again. Great color selections, vibrant colors and long lasting. The price was very reasonable for so many colors. I encourage other novices to utube for free lessons. I want to thank you for your PDF tips!
customer_reviews.author: Mary L Watson

customer_reviews.title: Colors not vibrant, more like water colors
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set to use for Halloween face painting and were very disappointed. After reading the reviews I expected that the colors would be vibrant but instead, despite many layers, they were more along the lines of watercolors. They also rubbed off easily, making it easy to take off after trick-or-treating but also meant re-application was required. I definitely would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Made in China!
customer_reviews.text: DO not buy this! I looked up Snazaroo brand and this is what came up, which is what I thought I was buying. There is no way I am going to trust something made in china on my students' faces.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbs49

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Seal of Approval
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on an unknown product because Amazon highly recommended it. I was NOT disappointed! This face paint is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kaylor

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping for some good paints to do some special FX make up. This one came with high reviews so I tried it out and I am so disappointed. The colors were not nearly as pigmented or bright as I had hoped for. I bought a cheaper face paint set for half the price that had much better color pay off. The packaging is nice but the paint itself requires several layers for the color to really be bright. Definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Garrett

customer_reviews.title: These are the most amazing face paints
customer_reviews.text: These are the most amazing face paints. They are bright and vivid as you like. They stay on pretty well as long as you do not rub your face too much. I recommend adding bits of water to your desired paint color using your paint brush to add the water. These paints I purchased were able to do 2 adult clown faces and had plenty to use. I cannot wait to use these for my childs birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the paints for me.
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend these paints for all over face color. Would work well for stencil work Cons: These paints dry very quickly, which makes it difficult to blend or work on an intricate detail Once on, the paints do not hold up as well as a creme based paint, I did side by side comparisons. The paints became itchy once applied to the face. Difficult to get consistent coverage due to having to mix with water Pros: Dries quickly making it easy to paint over another color. Does not need to be set with a powder Safe for kids Easy to wash off
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING FACE PAINT THAT WON’T PISS OFF YOUR SPOUSE
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing kids face paint ever... holy shit! It’s super easy to apply, doesn’t irritate my daughter’s ridiculously sensitive skin, and wipes right off with water on a cloth. Like wtf, where was this last year when my husband wouldn’t let me put makeup on my 1 year old but would’ve allowed paint if we found safe stuff??? Whatever 🙄 If you’re looking for great safe kids paint, buy this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Tierney Allen

customer_reviews.title: Pale, dull, not very vivid
customer_reviews.text: The intensity of the colors was extremely disappointing. Even layering several applications of color and applying the water color almost dry didn't result in a deeper, brighter, or more intense color, nothing like the colors shown in the pictures in the advertisements, which must have been done with a different line of paints. They do come off easily and dry reasonably quickly. My skin is very sensitive and I felt only a slight irritation after the paint had been on for more than an hour. I'm going to have to go back to a different brand of paint. Very disappointed in these.
customer_reviews.author: Ohbother52

customer_reviews.title: This picture is not even close to what you actually ...
customer_reviews.text: This picture is not even close to what you actually get. The paints are not in individual pots. They come in one tray without a cover. The paints had decent coverage, but certainly was not worth the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Bookfreak

customer_reviews.title: Buy once, use for years ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Someone recently asked a group of people I was in about hypoallergenic face paint for kids & Blue Squid’s was the FIRST thing that popped to mind! I’ve used these products on my own family’s faces for some time without ever having an issue & we’ve used them at gatherings and parties for kids for years. All of our original palettes are still going strong (despite lots of use) and no one has EVER reported a break out to me. Plus, they will wipe off with baby wipes, which makes clean up a breeze. I HIGHLY recommend these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: The disk are not removable, they each have a clear cap on them. The brushes that came with the kit are great, but I did need more than those 2. The stencils were sticky for 2 applications and then lost their stickiness. The color that went empty first was the white one. I was a little disappointed in the size of the disks. They are between the size of a quarter and a .50 cent piece. So I’d suggest to buy an extra white disk for backup.
customer_reviews.author: HJarnagan

customer_reviews.title: Easy on. Easy off. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the kids! Non-toxic and water based so it comes off super easy. I didn’t even use soap and it rinsed off easily and did not leave a greasy residue. There is a learning curve with them as you learn the right amount of water to paint ratio but once you do there is good coverage. I am happy with this purchase and the girls have had so much fun this quarantine painting and getting painted. And the pots do pop out individually FYI. A great purchase. I will buy again for the school field day(the ones last year were atrocious!) when that happens eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu518

customer_reviews.title: Please read.
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with this product at all! The picture is misleading; the paints are the size of a half dollar. I ran out of paint in two containers during a 3 1/2 hour event. The paints dried up quickly. It was hard to find the right consistency. The brown is like a terra-cotta color. The yellow was to light. - - - Since my last review of a one star, the company has been extremely kind. They have given me a full refund and a new set of paints. I can only hope it was just a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Talisha Zerfoss

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it to use for a Halloween party and painted 50+ faces with it. I would recommend buying some other brushes, the ones that came with were pretty small and not the best quality. I also bought sparkles to spruce it up a bit. The paint itself worked out well, it was not the greatest quality I have ever used, but for the price it was worth it. The colors yellow and green werenot very vibrant, I wish they would have stood out a bit more. However, all the other colors looked great. It did fade over time. Also, washed off pretty easily with some water and coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great variety, bright colors, easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: These paints are creamy and smooth and are very easy to use. I love the variety of colors and that the black and white are larger amounts since these are the ones that will get the most use. The stencils are the perfect size for kids and are sticky so you can get clean lines when filling in with paint. The kit comes with a variety of brushes to get you started and sponges that are great for blending. I like that the box has a foam insert that holds everything in place. It's a nice box to store everything in between uses. I'm going to have a lot of fun making my son up for Halloween with this set!
customer_reviews.author: Joe & KimbersTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Dont Sweat
customer_reviews.text: These were pretty easy to use, the colors were pigmented ok & they dont dry oily, but if you even think about sweating the color runs down your face. My husband is a drummer & he had a show so he sweats A LOT while playing and I didnt expect his make up to last, but my paint started running down my face after about half an hour of being in the bar. I only used the face paints for the black & colored portions of my face, the white was a different product. If youre using this product for children it will work just fine, but I wouldnt recommend for anything other than that.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Best customers support.  Care very much about customers satisfaction!
customer_reviews.text: This time I want to change my review for bluesquid to 4stars for their best customers support. After my first review, bluesquid customers support team contacted me and offer a new replacement paint set. My kid can't wait to use it over the coming holidays. I hope the new face painting set turn out great like the brushes set.
customer_reviews.author: Hung Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good, but be careful with water to paint ratio
customer_reviews.text: Overall these paints were great. Color was excellent pigment and good selection. My main complaint is it was difficult to get the right consistency of water to paint. Once I the hang of it, I was fine, but it took a few faces before I felt like the paint was smooth instead of gloppy. I painted at least 50 faces and barely made a dent in the amount, so there is plenty of paint for lots of faces.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Wolf is better!
customer_reviews.text: The Blue Squid paints are very faint, so it takes a long time to apply them. You need multiple coats, drying between each, in order to achieve decent coverage. The kit has too much packaging, not enough product. It's ok for kids, not good for adults doing Face Painting or cosplay. I recommend Wolf instead.
customer_reviews.author: MHL

customer_reviews.title: It’s all relative. Not a bad kit, not the best either. Sort of middle-of-the-road.
customer_reviews.text: I paint faces at least monthly. This is a great buy, but despite other reviews, I’m going to be the one who admits it doesn’t spread as well as “other” paints I’ve used. Having said that, it’s been knocked off the sink several times and not cracked or anything, so that’s a major plus. My only true complaint is the smell. I thought I was insane at first, but everyone agrees: the paint, once wet, smells eerily like....egg. (I do not know if this is a widespread issue given I only bought a single kit.)
customer_reviews.author: Novnelson

customer_reviews.title: Great face paint
customer_reviews.text: We used this product for a school carnival. I wasn't actually at the booth because I was helping to run the event. My daughter got her face painted and I watched for a minute. The kids doing the painting seemed to be using it very easily and the kids who had their faces painted looked great. My daughter doesn't have super sensitive skin, but sometimes she reacts to certain products. She didn't have any sort of reaction to the paint and it came off very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Brown

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Halloween and have since used it a few other times. It is a great kit and I enjoy using it for my kids and myself. Sometimes the coverage is not as great as a professionals, but I also realize that this is not a kit made for professional use. I would highly recommend this kit to anyone who wants to do some basic face painting yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Samuelson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rich colors
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Color goes on smoothly and in deep saturated tones. I painted dark Cleopatra eyes for my 6yo daughter for her Halloween costume, and I was worried that it might smudge or start to fade, but it looked perfect for hours (dark black and blue lines all around her eyes). Washes off very easily with water. She didn't complain about it bothering her eyes at all. I love that the color has a little shimmer to it. The brushes it comes with are decent, too. I think we will enjoy this set for years : )
customer_reviews.author: Lucia S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, a bit streaky but great colors.
customer_reviews.text: The colors weren't quite as opaque as I would hope, but I specifically only put one coat on for my swatches. I assume one more coat would do the trick to make it full coverage. I also had a layer of lotion on to help prevent staining, and it worked perfectly. Only the dark blue left a BARELY noticeable tint after washing off with water. The brushes that came with it are alright, definitely nothing special but fine for a bit of facepainting fun. Overall, 4.5 out of 5 stars, with a little less streaky color and no staining it would be a 5 for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Sammi G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great sellers
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great sellers. Originally received this product and received an email asking how it was. At first the paints were dry and cracked and the glitter paint was very dried out so I wrote back in response. They sent me a replacement as well as a free gift. The second batch was still slightly dried out however, they re-hydrate well with water and I didn't use the glitter paint (preferred just using loose glitter). Used these for my kid's kindergarten carnival and did at least 50 faces and hands. It worked beautifully! I still have a ton left and loved the brushes provided.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz1979

customer_reviews.title: Easy on skin, apply quick, stay for a long time, easily removed with water.
customer_reviews.text: Have been testing for a few days and I am in love. I wanted something easy on the skin and yet quick to apply so children wouldn't get anxious. I get great coverage, smooth and not clumpy. They wash off easily and there is no redness or irritation on anyone so far. I take this seriously and I am totally confident in these products and love the kit. Great pigmentation for nice thorough coverage.
customer_reviews.author: L. Canon

customer_reviews.title: Held up SO well and didn’t stain my skin
customer_reviews.text: This paint did an amazing job and held up all day. I only had a few smudges from my glasses and where I scratched around my nose a tad, and my lips. This is first applied, after work, and then after trick or treating. It stayed on and then washed off easily in the shower with water and bar soap. The red didn’t stain like others have in the past. This was exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit! The stencils are easy to use, the directions for the paint are clear, and it goes on great! I didn't use the brushes that come with it though so I can't speak for how they work, I used foam eye shadow applicators and wedges so that I could use a different one in each color. I would definitely buy this brand again. It says it does 100 faces but that must be full face because I did close to that with stencils (because I wasn't sure I could freehand) and it hardly looks used.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: These paints were perfect for our day if the dead kid party
customer_reviews.text: These paints were perfect for our day if the dead kid party. The brushed that are included were the perfect sizes to create a professional look. Highly recommended! Painted 12 kids faces and hardly made a dent in the paint pots. This will last through many more face paint parties!
customer_reviews.author: DKWaggs

customer_reviews.title: Great paints!
customer_reviews.text: I love these paints! Glides onto skin very smooth, pigment is great and they wash off with just water, soap isn’t even necessary. They have been awesome to have during quarantine! my four kids would do face painting on each other then my husband and I would have to guess what Animal or look it was! I absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: These are great face paints!
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased with these paints. They go on smoothly, stay on until washed off with soapy water, and the colors are vibrant. I have been a professional face painter for a long time, and these paints are just as good as aqua color, the ones I used to use before i moved away and didn't have access to the store where I used to get them. The brushes are ok for now, i need to get some real artist brushes, but for the price I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Party tested and approved!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my 5-year-old's outdoor birthday party this summer. Stayed on great. Washed off easy. It did come off during water games, but that was expected. It actually held up pretty well with people sweating. It was very easy to paint with on faces, and there were zero skin reactions. Opacity was perfect on skin. Cleanup was very easy with the individual paint pots. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Tigerdrow

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: These paints have a lot of pigment and the intensity is easy to control according to how much water is mixed in. I used these for children’s face painting as well as on myself for día de los muertos and it stayed on for 10 hours! I can also tell that this set will last for many many face painting sessions (great value). The brushes are also of good quality and it’s easy to wash off with a good cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Vivi

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but also not great...
customer_reviews.text: The face paint itself is okay. Not the best quality but not the worst. The black paint is a little hard to remove so be careful with this. You really have to scrub. I was also a little disappointed as the lid was shattered at one corner.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gentil

customer_reviews.title: Colors in product photo not what received
customer_reviews.text: Ordered classic colors- received 2 neon orange, 2 neon yellow, 4 shades of red, a neon green, and no black or brown.
customer_reviews.author: SAMbh

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I took advantage of a bonus offer and got a terrific assortment of colors! Some photos show a hand holding individual pots of paint, but this palette is all in one tray — if that’s important to you. Great product and great pricing. Amazon just slapped a label in the product box for mailing and it arrived intact.
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: This paint worked great for a kids party I was recruited to face ...
customer_reviews.text: This paint worked great for a kids party I was recruited to face paint for. I was in no way a professional so the stencils came in handy, just wish they were bigger. The paint was great quality and was more than enough for about 30 (give or take) semi-full faces. The less water you use the more opaque the color. I would definitely order this set again and keep it on hand for the kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Domena

customer_reviews.title: Dried out and uneven application
customer_reviews.text: Did not go on smoothly or evenly. The paint was completely dried out and I had to add water to paintbrush to make it work. But it did not apply well. Overall very unhappy with product. I used a different product the year before and was satisfied with it. But I saw the raving reviews on this product and decided to spend a little more to achieve even better results. So sorry that I switched. FYI it was used on day of the dead face painting.
customer_reviews.author: NatureGal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but fades quick
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product is safe for little’s skin and not full of toxins etc, but I don’t think it is what I hoped for when I purchased a face painting kit. I bought this because it was highly rated, but should have read specific reviews. The paint is pretty easy to apply, but it doesn’t last more than an hour before it starts to wear off. Four hours later and the paint is like a ghost of the original design. So this might be best if you only want a short lived design or something that is super easy to wipe away. I would have preferred a longer lasting paint.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Of course you need to try it out on yourself first
customer_reviews.text: This facepaint was as advertised. If you know how to use watercolor/guache you'll have a good beginning. You need to prewet and maintain some wetness and control the water in your brush and you'll have great results. Best part was having the line of children with the bluesquid facepaint visit the 'professional' facepainter and seeing her creations next to mine was fun. Mixed BEST part was parents complain how her paint would sting their kids eyes and was hard to remove and how easy BLUE squid was to get off. Just water!
customer_reviews.author: M. FINE

customer_reviews.title: Great paint!!
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Doesn't smudge, or wipe off on clothes. Just dip the paint brush in water and you can make it as thin or thick as you want. Very easy to apply. Short dry time. Our kids wore it all day at a birthday party with no problems and they absolutely loved it. Still haven't figured out a good way to get the glitter out and apply it, since it's not glitter paint, it's just compact glitter.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great quality paints!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase!!! I bought these for our Halloween costumes and I am not disappointed! Be sure to read the directions because if you add a little water to the brush before applying it comes out smoother and you can adjust the thickness to your liking. I would purchase this again... PLUS they give you a deep discount for more brushes!
customer_reviews.author: Daina

customer_reviews.title: Shallow paint cylinders runs low after 4 days of use
customer_reviews.text: The paints could have been a little bit deeper. After 4 days of use the bottom on a few colors came through. Also, the stencils should be a slightly larger, and also use a more sturdier paper/plastic so that when you go to peel off the stencil the paint doesn’t smudge. I had to use my own brushes because the 3 brushes it comes with is CRAP.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Love this kit.
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit, easy to apply, easy to remove, no mess at all. I bought it in April, and use it till September, white and black colors ran out first, I bought them separately in summer, Blue Squid Pro. I am not a professional, I make face painting for my 6 years old daughter 3-4 times a week, sometimes 2 times a day. I encourage her for reading books that way. She is happy, she can choose any characters she wants to be and then play, I am happy she enjoys reading books, lots of books!!! Today I placed an order for another one BlueSquid kit, and I want to try crayons too.
customer_reviews.author: Tetiana

customer_reviews.title: The pictures make it look like a hard plastic case with a lid
customer_reviews.text: I’d give a 5 for the paints. The color went on well! Unfortunately, it does not come as advertised. It was a plastic tray with small cakes that come in a cardboard sleeve not little pots. The pictures make it look like a hard plastic case with a lid, it does not come packaged like that. There was also only 2 brushes not 3. The stencils are small stickers and they worked great. They produced nice designs. I would buy again for quality of paints but for $25, I was bummed to get this and give as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sir_Tone

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, easy to use face paints.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter began painting everyone's faces as soon as she opened the Blue Squid Face Paints which she got for her birthday. The paints are easy to use and the colors are vibrant. She wished the set included a brown paint - for bears, monkeys, etc. At the end of the day, the faces washed off with soap and water. One issue - the matte paints felt great on the skin and didn't rub off, but the glitter smeared if it was touched.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Akin

customer_reviews.title: disappointed in the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the colors do you really well and come off really dark, and some of them are very light and are almost like watercolors. These are all pastel colors. The picture shows that there might be some black, but I had to order Black separately. For the price, I was very disappointed in the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: curtis donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Transparent and doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Nice selection of colors but we found it to be very transparent face paint that didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: Meelia

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: All of my kids have sensitive skin and they all enjoy playing with this product. We’ve had it a little over a week and they have already spent hours playing with this product. We brought it out for family night and even the teenagers and adults in the house had fun face and arm painting. Some of the colors do require a little extra effort to remove but we just use a little lotion after soap and water and it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy to layer. Otherwise good quality.
customer_reviews.text: For beginners this a pretty good palette. While the colors are nice, they seem to be a little hard to keep applied. There were a few spots that when I went to layer more color, it'd just start to rub color away. Otherwise this is is a pretty decent palette. My only other disappointment was the fact that with the 3 brushes I got with it, one of them had bent brushes. This makeup was just something quick to check out the quality. Like I said, great for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyanna Flaming

customer_reviews.title: Hours of entertainment at home, no fuss cleanup
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her friends love having their faces painted, and these made it so easy. The paint pots were set in a nice tray and don’t slide around, it comes with 3 good brushes for general use, and with just a little water, we had all day fun. Easy to clean up too, paint comes right out with a little water, and a wet washcloth took care of the faces, didn’t need soap! Stayed on for a good amount of time, as long as no one needed to wipe off popsicle juice (hot afternoon). Would buy again, or in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Face Paint!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely some of the best face paint ever! I've tried others for Halloween and this went on smooth and never caked. It stayed on my face the entire day and never looked cracked or dried up. Really top of the line face paints and you get a lot... each color comes as a nice size that will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: So at first I thought I was duped and it was a horrible product until I turned the box over are realized that's where the directions were. I didn't realize water was the working component until then. Once I figured that out it worked amazing. It's easy to wash off with both soap and water. My face didn't feel irritated this is perfect for me and all others I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for a Halloween tutorial of 'Mommy Shark' on my YouTube channel Nicole Dionne. I also used it in my beauty Studio to create Halloween looks for clients. One of my clients won top prize in a contest she was in! I recommend this face paint kit. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Dionne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect face paint!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Loved these paints. I had bought some paint from walmart originally, but when I got them home and tried them out they were garbage. Returned those and ordered these online. They were perfect! We used them for a carnival themed birthday party that we had. They dried fast and lasted long after. We were even able to paint the baby. Turned out great, and I have enough paint left over for at least 10 more parties. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Christ4yalife

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Super pigmented. I painted a bunch of kids’ faces for a birthday party and I was super impressed by how easy it was to apply this & how easy it washes off with just water. Didn’t leave any stains or whatsoever on their skin!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, everything arrived in perfect condition, the paints are smooth and easy to apply, vibrant colors, great quality and the color palate is lovely. The individual lits are wonderful and help keep the palate clean and preserve the paint. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: MrsLee

customer_reviews.title: No pigment
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised these paints have such good reviews. There is no pigment and the staying power is weak. You have to apply multiple coats and it's still not very opaque. Very disappointed. I will use it for practice but I would go with tag next time. For like 10 bucks more you can have a pigmented product.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for kids and adults. They go on easily and clearly, last well, but also wash off easily. I let my daughter paint her face whenever she wants with these. It's become more of a regular arts and crafts thing rather than a special occasion thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna L

customer_reviews.title: IT'S A HIT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used the product last night with my daughter it was an absolutely a hit! Easy to use, easy to clean and she didn't want to take it off! Highly recommend. Will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: We use these at our school’s carnival each year, and I love them!! They go on easily w just a little water, and they don’t smear once dry! The colors are bright, and the brushes that come w them are good. I just bought some for my daughter’s birthday party because I’m such a fan of them. My girls have been using the stencils on each other and like them, but they are small.
customer_reviews.author: Kris S.

customer_reviews.title: Good color quality, good on skin, easy to remove if needed, good price
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a school face paint station and it worked really well. Super easy to take off if needed, no complaints about skin reactions, and a good array of colors. 9/10 only because I really wish the brushes included were flat and slightly thicker for easier quick coverage.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: I like the way it feels and sets on the face
customer_reviews.text: Update: I did not reach out to the company about being unsatisfied with the color turn outs, yet they saw my review and without question, simply refunded my purchase, told me to keep the paints, and that they were sorry I wasn't satisfied. Although I wasn't with the colors, this companies customer service is amazing. I will absolutely try them out again in the future. -I like the way it feels and sets on the face, but the colors are very very light. You have to use a ton for it to be noticeable, and even at that, it's very light. Can't go over eyebrows or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Shanelle McClellan

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to try face painting but didn't know which one to try. I read review after review and decided on Blue Squid. I have very sensitive skin and was worried about irritation. There was no irritation and came off with soap and water with ease. I will definitely be buying more supplies from them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Very nice face paints that go on and come off very easily!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a few different kinds of face paints and these are hands down the best brand I’ve tried. They went on my kid’s face nice and smooth and blended well. The included brushes worked out well too, I didn’t even have to dig around in my art studio to find my artist’s brushes! The best part was that when trick or treating was over, it came off just as nicely as it went on. My kid looked great and she was so happy! Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: maggiesmama

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my daughter for her 8th birthday. She absolutely loves and has either been painting her own face or anyone else in the house who will agree to let her paint their face! :)
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Good set...
customer_reviews.text: So far I only tried the blue and red, but they are AWESOME!! Great coverage, just need to use very little water, the more water you use, the more transparent the color it. **Update, I have tried other colors, the yellow is really pale and more transparent than other colors, which is disappointing, and the brown/tan is very orange-like. Still, a decent set and I will make do.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki10ann

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product!!! I bought this to use for our Halloween makeup and couldn't be happier. Easy to use, great coverage, dries fast, doesn't crack, peel or smudge, lightweight, and extremely easy to remove with just water or baby wipes! I was also pleasantly surprised at how well the included stick-on stencils worked. This set will provide enough paint for 100+ uses. The only thing I didn't like about this set were the included brushes (cheap plastic), but they're perfect for kids to use. I didn't buy this for brushes, so we ended up using our own. I will definitely be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smear, nice and vibrant!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality, vibrancy and longevity of this paint! We are using this for musical theater and it can't smudge! Its great and will definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter saved her money to purchase the facepaints, and we are so happy with them. They paint in really well, and are opaque. They also wash off easily and don't leave stains. We are super happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: TheCarnahans

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Just had our carnival night for vbs tonight. Bought Blue Squid and another brand because I had no idea how much we'd need. The gal who used the Blue Squid said they were the best she has ever used and she has done this several times. It didn't look like hardly any had been used and I'm sure she probably did at least 30 kids. Just looking at the 2 brands side by side after use it was a no brainer that Blue Squid is the better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma J

customer_reviews.title: Best Face paint
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleasantly surprised by how pigmented these paints are. And they work great with the stencils! These are definitely the best face paints I have ever used. Easy clean up too! Will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy to use, washes off when done!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter bought this to do face painting for all the neighborhood kids in the summer. It’s been a hit! Easy for her to apply, the stencils are fun and work pretty well, and it all washes off with a little hypoallergenic baby soap when done!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good paint but becareful of whats in it!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old wanted to practice painting faces and so I ordered this for her and I to practice with. The paint was easy to use and worked great. I gave it one less star because when i went to use the black there was a hard coil mixed in it. Luckily it had pulled out in my paintbrush and I noticed it. If my daughter had done it she might not have seen it and could have scratched herself.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these paint sets for Halloween. I had issues with a few of the colors, like black and orange which wouldn't stay on nor were they dark enough. However, the company promptly contacted me and addressed all my concerns. I am pleased with their attention to detail and customer service. I haven't had a chance to use the new set of paints but appreciate the great customer service and would buy their products again! Considering the great reviews, I might just have had that one defective product, either way, this company is worth your time and hopefully, this next set of paints work!
customer_reviews.author: Nimsy Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic paints only a few colors are minorly disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Fun paints! Wish the green, yellow and orange were more vibrant, however, the rest of the colors are wonderful. They mix well together and have great pigmentation. They build nicely or you can keep the colors lighter if you prefer. Blending the yellow to the orange was a bit trickier because of opacity but it worked in the end. The paint washed off easily and did not irritate mine or my children’s skin.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron R Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to use and provided bright, consistent colors. It washed off very easily and in spite of known skin issues and skin sensitivity among my group, none of us had any reaction to it. It does need to be mixed with water and it can be a little tricky to get the balance of water to paint correct, but it really doesn't take long at all to get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product that arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: These colors are exceptional. we were at a party where i put out this paint for other face painters to use. they loved them and the idea that by using a drop of water they worked wonders. All the painters decided to buy this instead of the face paint in little jars that clumps. We will be using this product from now on. I also bought two of the larger sets which included sponges and along with gold and silver.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Raybourn

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great! It's easy to layer and manipulate
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! It's easy to layer and manipulate. And it can be blended well. When mixed with water it creates a more stable consistency. It doesn't rub off or stay greasy and it has a matte finished look. Great fun. I need to build a kit for my stage makeup class and this was the perfect edition. The only complaint I have is that I received 2 brushes instead of 3 , which was a bummer for me. But I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t show up well on skin.
customer_reviews.text: These face paints are not very good quality. The colors are weird and don’t show up very good on skin. They’re not very opaque and the colors are not very vivid. The red is not very red. The yellow is really pale. I made do for the party today, but I will never buy this brand again. Last time I used a set from Snazaroo that worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: N. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried out a few other face paints before and found them to be too runny and not thick or they don't last minutes so forget an entire night. This was great as it's thick as you make it and lasts, woke up with my face still painted from the night before. Best face paint I have found so far. A bit pricey though, but worth the money in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: A little harder to use than Snazaroo, but price may be worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Painted faces at a Soccer Fest event. Did about a hundred and fifty faces in 3 hours. These paints take a little more work to get the consistency right vs. more expensive brands. It takes a little longer to work the water into the cake. However, with such a great price, I believe it was worth the extra time it took to get used to the new paints.
customer_reviews.author: Joetta Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good colors! Nice starter set!
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality paint. Bright colors, the silver glitter looks like a great bonus, and the case is great! Its also nice that the colors are all removable so you can change one out if its running low. My only critique with that is I wish the colors locked into the case a little better so i could hold the palate when Im painting without worrying they will fall out.
customer_reviews.author: CookieBunny

customer_reviews.title: Bright, Vivid colors that are easy to wash off
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this product for a block party event, and the quality was amazing!! The colors were very bright and vivid, without having to cake on the product. They went on smooth, and washed off with soap and water without any hard scrubbing. I have had trouble in the past with some of the reds and blacks dying the skin after they are washed off, but I did not have a problem with these! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cora Lanclos

customer_reviews.title: Fine on my kids sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Great face paint! Easy to apply, doesn’t require much water, just enough to rinse the brush between colors. My kids always beg to get their face painted at theme parks, parties, and festivals. It’s such a special treat to paint their faces anytime! The stencils are a bonus to start off with. Lasted all day, easy to wash off with soapy water.
customer_reviews.author: Vanillas

customer_reviews.title: Love this kit.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. My 8 and 6yo daughters painted their own faces as well as all the younger kids at a big party. Cute stencils. If you do whole faces in a solid color without using a sponge and knowing how to make it last (ie if kids do it), it will go on thick and get used up quick. But plenty of paint in the pots to be worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: It’s the same brand the face painters at the fair we’re using.
customer_reviews.text: Went to a fair and saw this was the brand the face painters were using. I decided to buy my own so when our kids friends come over, we can have face painting as well. The kids love it. Great paint set. Buying a guide book with step by step instructions on how to paint different animals or characters helps too.
customer_reviews.author: cdl

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL paints !! Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this paint - the packaging is great, the brushes are nice, the colors are bright & vivid! I used a bright blue on my hand first thing to check staining & it wiped right off with no color left behind! I’m super impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done but you have to use a damp sponge to get it on somewhat evenly. Great for kids, above average for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Baja_Nene

customer_reviews.title: Love it so fun!
customer_reviews.text: Soooooo much fun! My kid’s have been loving this and get to be so creative. We have always wanted to try something like this and it makes it so easy to learn, will definitely order again
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Missing one brush, lids for paint pots and hardcover to close :(
customer_reviews.text: ***UPDATE*** Customer service contacted me and sent me the right set as soon as they realized the mistake. Changed from 1 to 5 stars for the great customer service and quick action to right the problem. Did not receive the 3 brushes it states in the description, only received two. Also it came in the paper box similar to the one shown but it did not have the clear over over the actual paint case. And no plastic lids to cover paint. Stencils came as pictured. A little disappointed, I thought it would be in a hard case and be able to have the paint pots close.
customer_reviews.author: M. Samson

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Better than I anticipated.  Easy on and off.
customer_reviews.text: Love these face paints for my toddler! They stay on even better than I anticipated and are easy to wash off. They do not rub off on her clothing. Great colors and so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

product_meta.title: Blue Squid Face Paint Kit for Kids – 30 Stencils, 12 Large Washable Paints, 3 Brushes, Safe Facepainting for Sensitive Skin, Professional Quality Body & Face Facepaints Halloween Makeup Paint Supplies
feature_bullets: ✔ 𝟯𝘅 𝗠𝗢𝗥𝗘 𝗣𝗔𝗜𝗡𝗧! Each pot contains 10ml/.35oz of beautiful washable paint (most other brands supply only 3ml/0.1oz) that’s enough for 100+ faces!! Supplied in a STURDY reusable cosmetic carry case These water activated paints are like painting with a rainbow! Colors include white, black, red, purple, blue, light blue, pink, green, orange / gold, yellow, grey / silver & brown.

✔ 𝗪𝗔𝗧𝗘𝗥𝗕𝗔𝗦𝗘𝗗 - 𝗣𝗘𝗥𝗙𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗙𝗢𝗥 𝗦𝗘𝗡𝗦𝗜𝗧𝗜𝗩𝗘 𝗦𝗞𝗜𝗡! These facepaints are perfect for children & toddlers with sensitive skin. They are safe superior cosmetic grade make up, hypoallergenic, paraben-free, vegan, natural and US compliant. As with all cosmetics we advise that a small skin patch test is done before applying as everyone's skin is different. Being water activated clean up is as quick and easy as wiping the face paint off with a wet wipe or soapy was

✔ 𝗖𝗢𝗠𝗣𝗟𝗘𝗧𝗘 𝗙𝗔𝗖𝗘 𝗣𝗔𝗜𝗡𝗧𝗜𝗡𝗚 𝗞𝗜𝗧!! You'll also receive 30 reusable Stencils, 3 Brushes; thick brush for maximum coverage, thin for outlines & an ultra-thin for perfect detail work, all for one value-packed price! Ideal for many uses including - school, church, fetes, festivals, carnivals, birthday parties, cosplay, costume, fx, army camouflage, military, belly pregnancy, sports, theatre performances, role play, make up, unicorn or any fictitious superhero type character & Hall

✔ 𝗙𝗨𝗡 𝗪𝗜𝗧𝗛 𝗬𝗢𝗨𝗥 𝗞𝗜𝗗𝗦! You don't have to be an artist or pro face painter to give your children hours of creative fun with our face painting kits. As a Blue Squid customer, you'll get instant access to an exciting free bonus: an online kids facepainting ideas guide with step-by-step videos that show you how to whip up fantastic face paint designs!

✔ 𝟭𝟬𝟬% 𝗥𝗜𝗦𝗞 𝗙𝗥𝗘𝗘 𝗣𝗨𝗥𝗖𝗛𝗔𝗦𝗘! We're so confident about the quality of our face paints that if you have any issues, we're very happy to either provide a no-questions-asked Refund or Replacement. Order today risk free while stocks last!
